entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
